Description: Dark serpentine vase with flat base, convex sides with two horizontally pierced tubular handles, contracted mouth and flat ledge-rim, chipped in places, interior shows clear signs of rotary drilling.
Curator's comments: Published: Art and Afterlife in Ancient Egypt (Japan 1999-2000): No 56
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2001 26 Jun-23 Sep, Birmingham Gas Hall, Egypt Revealed
